author: cmpilato
msg: Change "Joe" and "Jane" to "Harry" and "Sally".  Remove the colors, and
fix "prime" indicators (ala A') to not have the smart-quotes characters.

author: cmpilato
msg: Removed references to dead chapter 5 diagrams -- use text instead.

author: ringstrom
msg: Fix issue #1749: cvs2svn handles branch+tag labels differently from CVS
Make cvs2svn.py error out if it finds that a label is used for a tag
in one file but for a branch in another file (instead of creating
incorrect data).  This is an error that needs to be fixed in the CVS
(CollectData.__init__): Add new members to track label types.
(CollectData.define_tag): Verify that the label types are consistent.

author: philip
msg: Provide an ordering guarantee for svn_io_dir_walk.  This is required
by "svnadmin hotcopy" which could otherwise fail on an ext3 filesystem
a directory before invoking it on any files or subdirectories in the
